data.message:
Hi there, my brother's account had gotten suspended for no reason, it's been a week after he submitted the photo for verification. May you help us escalate this issue? As his account, crystal877@outlook.com is very important to him. He needs it back asap🙂 We couldn't find any email address for facebook to contact this issue.

Hi, why at the end of photos verification is blank? How he going to verify with that? He have uploaded a card with my name stated" AVIX FAM" and for profile photo, you can check his instagram account "avix0706". If you still don't believe the photo is him, you can verify through Skype video chat.

replies.message: Hi, 文祥. If your brother has submitted his ID, then please sit tight while we take the time to review it. Rest assured that we are looking into all the reports that we receive. Thanks for your patience. -Rhea
Meanwhile, they allow actual pages with profanity in the heading. Lol. #lame
hello , my account was being disabled without me getting any kind of notification . how can I get it back ?
I'm tying to submit photo showing my identity but it says field is blank

Hey there. Here are possible reasons why your account might have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2e1s07v. If you believe that it was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal in the link above. Thanks. -Elizabeth
When are you going to start being fair, Facebook?
I'm sorry but this is not helping me at all . I'm trying to submit the papers it's asking but the field keeps showing blank , what else can I do then ?
funny thing is that pedophiles and criminals profiles keep going . I just didn't have my surname , that's all
got nothing to hide there,  but my acc has been taken from me as if I was a criminal
Welcome to the one-sided world of Facebook.
